answer:
QUESTION
Assalamu alaikum Presently I am living in U.S.A. I have been married for 11 years. I am constantly having dream for about 10 years that I am at my parent's home in my country for a visit. My husband later joints me in my parents home in my country . Then what I see that my mother in law comes to my parents home. She trying to takes away my husband. At that moment (May allah keep us in his prtection) my husband divorce me and walk away with his mother. I Just to let you know that I have dreamed for at leasr 10 to 12 time during the last 10 years. Can you please explain me in detail the tabeer of my dream. Allah Hafiz. Annonymous
ANSWER


Share:
The dream has no significance. You should ignore the dream as that will lead
you to be paranoid.

The Shaytaan wish to create anxiety and grief in you through such dreams.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
